description: Overview Data & Analysis – Data Scientist Digitas is a highly-caffeinated playground where brilliant minds come together to bring bold, award-winning ideas to life. We believe that data should never exist in a vacuum; instead, it should be put to work to bring the best ideas and stories to our clients. Digitas Data Science practice sits within our DNA (Data & Analysis) capability, and develops industry-leading analytical solutions for clients across industries, channels and business functions.
